Articles.Content:
I haven't been doing much KSP because I've been busy making a Raspberry Pi control my garage door for my motorcycle.

Anyway, I wish I had a dad this cool!

http://makezine.com/video/making-fun-mission-control-desk/

That looks cool I also found instructions for a mini desktop foundry too. http://makezine.com/projects/make-36-boards/desktop-foundry/

Not to mention I been to the Maker Faire.
